blogPost.excerpt: Check is a payroll-as-a-service API that lets you embed payroll directly in your product. We provide all the building blocks for full-featured payroll, including a powerful API, modular white-label onboarding components, and a partner dashboard.
blogPost.body: Check is a payroll-as-a-service API that lets you embed payroll directly in your product. We provide all the building blocks for full-featured payroll, including a powerful API, modular white-label onboarding components, and a partner dashboard.
blogPost.title: Check - Embed payroll in your product
blogPost.author: Nathan Baschez

localize.description: Check是一个薪资即服务的API，让您可以将薪资直接嵌入到您的产品中。我们为全功能的工资单提供了所有的构建模块，包括一个强大的API、模块化的白标上岗组件和一个合作伙伴仪表板。
localize.tagline: 在您的产品中嵌入工资单

localize.description: Check是一個薪資即服務的API，讓您可以將薪資直接嵌入到您的產品中。我們爲全功能的工資單提供了所有的構建模塊，包括一個強大的API、模塊化的白標上崗組件和一個合作伙伴儀表板。
localize.tagline: 在您的產品中嵌入工資單

previous.excerpt: The one link to get hired and sell your visual content. Drive followers from Instagram and other networks to buy your images & get job offers. Perfect for illustrators, photographers, artists, visual storytellers... etc
previous.title: Minty Link - The one link to get hired and sell your content

localize.description: 一个环节，让你的视觉内容得到雇佣和销售。吸引Instagram和其他网络的追随者购买你的图片和获得工作机会。完美的插画师，摄影师，艺术家，视觉故事讲述者......等等。
localize.tagline: 雇人、卖内容的一个环节。

localize.description: 一個環節，讓你的視覺內容得到僱傭和銷售。吸引Instagram和其他網絡的追隨者購買你的圖片和獲得工作機會。完美的插畫師，攝影師，藝術家，視覺故事講述者......等等。
localize.tagline: 僱人、賣內容的一個環節。

next.excerpt: For me, as a developer, finding an interesting idea to work on has always been challenging. If you are stuck at the idea stage, subscribe to the IdeasFor.dev newsletter to receive weekly project ideas in your inbox.
next.title: Ideas for dev - New ideas for your next project

localize.description: 对我来说，作为一名开发者，找到一个有趣的想法一直是个挑战。如果你还停留在想法阶段，请订阅IdeasFor.dev通讯，每周都能在你的收件箱中收到项目想法。
localize.tagline: 为您的下一个项目提供新思路

localize.description: 對我來說，作爲一名開發者，找到一個有趣的想法一直是個挑戰。如果你還停留在想法階段，請訂閱IdeasFor.dev通訊，每週都能在你的收件箱中收到項目想法。
localize.tagline: 爲您的下一個項目提供新思路
